views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9.2, 10, 11 and 12

bestDuelist Disables the Timer Countdown on QuizDuel (Clash) Application.

Get Rid of the Countdown Timer in the Questions and be Chilled Out to Think about (and Search lol) without the Ending of the Time (and then Game Over).

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below.

Thanks @karimouni24 for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.2
- Added support for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12.
- Added support for QuizDuel (Clash) Last App Version 8.0.0.
